info.description: REST API for the Goshop e-commerce platform.
info.title: Goshop API

put.description: Updates category fields for the provided identifier

get.description: Returns paginated list of all orders for administrators

put.description: Updates the status of an order (admin only)

post.description: Uploads an image for a product

delete.description: Removes an image from a product (admin only)

patch.description: Toggles availability status of a product (admin only)

get.description: Returns all addresses for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new address for the authenticated user

get.description: Returns address details for the authenticated user

put.description: Updates an existing address belonging to the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes an address belonging to the authenticated user

get.description: Returns a signed URL to the authenticated user's avatar
Returns the current cart for the authenticated user

delete.description: Removes all products from the authenticated user's cart

post.description: Adds a product to the authenticated user's cart

put.description: Updates the quantity of a product in the authenticated user's cart

delete.description: Removes a product from the authenticated user's cart

get.description: Returns paginated list of orders for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new order for the authenticated user

get.description: Returns details of an order belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Cancels an order belonging to the authenticated user

put.description: Uploads or replaces the authenticated user's avatar

post.description: Creates a review for a product by the authenticated user

put.description: Updates a review created by the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes a review created by the authenticated user

get.description: Handles Google OAuth callback, exchanges code for user info and returns JWT
Redirects the user to the Google OAuth consent screen

post.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns JWT token
Registers a new user and returns JWT token

get.description: Returns the full list of categories with product counts
Returns category details for the provided identifier
Returns products that belong to the specified category
Returns aggregate review statistics for a product
